dict.acceptation: 兴趣，爱好；利害关系，利益；利息；趣味，感兴趣的事；
使产生兴趣；使参与，使加入；引起…的意愿；使产生关系；

sent.orig: Simple interest does not reflect this time value of money because interest doesn't earn interest.
sent.trans: 单利不能反映货币的时间价值，因为根据单利概念利息并不赚取利息。

sent.orig: In the privatization process, the interest groups involved have different interest orientation and interest selection.
sent.trans: 在国有企业民营化的过程中，其所涉及的利益群体均有各自不同的利益取向及利益选择。

sent.orig: Using simple interest year-on-year, non-compound interest, overdue interest bearing another.
sent.trans: 采用单利按年付息，不计复利，逾期不另计息。

sent.orig: The interest is compounded:to compute (interest) on the principal and accrued interest.
sent.trans: 如果你不支取，它将并入原有的存款，在以后的六个月里，你将得到按本金1,022.50美元计算的利息。

sent.orig: Methods: deposits, withdrawals, inquiries, and interest cumulative interest.
sent.trans: 方法：存款，取款，查询，计算利息，累加利息等。
